text.section:
In this section:
"precious metal bullion or coins" means:
any precious metal that has gone through a refining process and is in a state or condition such that its value depends on its precious metal content and not on its form; or
except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, monetized bullion, coins, or other forms of money that:
"precious metal bullion or coins" does not include jewelry or a work of art made of precious metal bullion or coins.
The sales and use tax does not apply to a sale of precious metal bullion or coins if the sale price is greater than $1,000.
